Headline: #65 Grand Temporary Reroute at Grand/Orleans.
ShortDescription: #65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Grand, Wells, Illinois and Orleans, due to a street blockage near Grand/Orleans.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Grand, Wells, Illinois, Orleans, then resume their normal route on Grand, due to a street blockage near Grand/Orleans.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park- bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Pulaski .
ShortDescription: Forest Park- bound Blue Line trains are standing at Pulaski due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park- bound Blue Line trains are standing at Pulaski due to police activity.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
